subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:  
I awaited the payment confirmation copy but to no avail. What happened? Please, kindly keep me updated.
You can call me at or text: +1 510.516.6130

Mr. Paul Gardner
UN COMPENSATIONS PAYMENTS UNIT
2001 River Park Dr, Louisville, KY 40211, USA

subject: Re:  Attention:
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Gardner,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble with the payment copy. Could you please provide more details about the issue? What exactly seems to be the problem? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Richard
